original_title: Naked and Funny Special 6. When Panties Attack!
overview: If you like seeing incredibly hot girls ‘accidentally’ stripped down to the skimpiest of skivvies... If the words 'funny' 'bra' and 'panties' are music to your ears... If you like your comedy served up with a steaming side of sex appeal, then you’ll love "Naked & Funny: When Panties Attack!"
title: Naked and Funny Special 6. When Panties Attack!
